Jack Wilshere: The Arsenal midfielder missed all of last season after an injury nightmare in his career

Arsenal's troubled season has lurched into new crisis. Tuesday's Capital One Cup penalty shoot-out defeat by Bradford City has left manager Arsene Wenger under intense pressure and questions are being asked about his future.

An exodus of big-name players - such as former captains Cesc Fabregas and Robin van Persie - over recent seasons, reports of coaching staff bust-ups and the infamous failure to win a trophy in seven years has only added to
